name: Snowcat Trail Groomer: The Ski Mountain Snow Grooming - Free
name_original: Snowcat Trail Groomer: The Ski Mountain Snow Grooming - Free
description:
IT'S HEAVY SNOWFALL OUT THERE AND YOU HAVE IMPORTANT JOB TO DO!

You have to make mountain READY for skiing and snowboarders. Control your snowcat trail groomer to make the surface plain but try to avoid trees and big rocks. If you crush them then your snowcat will wreck so be careful.

There is a day shift and a night shift waiting for you!
------------------
How to play?

- Control your snowcat trail groomer with your finger
- Reach 2500 m to win the game
- Try to avoid trees and big rock
- Remove all snow bumps on your way
- Collect as many coins are possible to unlock other trailcat

DOWNLOAD Snowcat Trail Groomer for FREE!

Suggestions are welcome! Please send them to us.
Join us at: support@meilleursjeuxmobiles.com
